SQL_STMT_U.val: insert into gesqlret (Id_registro, Usuario, Campo3, Campo88, Campo4, Campo63, Campo133, Campo89, Campo23, Campo5) select row_number() over (order by a.OP) + (select max(Id_registro) from gesqlret(nolock)), ':1', 'MONITORPROCESSO', * from (select pr.OP, dem.Item, mat.Descricao, sum(dem.qt_necessaria) Qt_necessaria, tal.talao, um.Mascara, isnull((select top 1 r.Descricao from TE_TALAOXRESP tr (nolock) inner join TE_RESPOSTA r (nolock) on r.Pergunta = tr.Pergunta and r.Sequencia = tr.Resposta inner join TE_PERGUNTA p (nolock) on p.Id = tr.Pergunta and p.Exibe_Monitor = 1 where tr.OP = pr.OP), '') Comprimento from :3/*PCPROCOP*/ pr (nolock) inner join :4/*PCTAOP*/ tal (nolock) on tal.OP = pr.OP and tal.Class_hierarq_ini = pr.Class_hierarq and tal.situacao = 'A' and tal.Num_neg = ':8' inner join :4/*PCTAOP*/ tala (nolock) on tala.OP = tal.OP and tala.situacao = 'C' and tala.Num_neg = ':8' and tala.Cd_area_setor = (select Area_process from :3/*PCPROCOP*/ esc (nolock) where esc.OP = pr.OP and esc.Process_item = 'ESCAREACAO') inner join :5/*PCDEMOP*/ dem (nolock) on dem.OP = pr.OP and dem.Class_hierarq = pr.Class_hierarq and dem.atendido = 0 inner join :6/*ESMATERI*/ mat (nolock) on mat.Cd_material = dem.Item inner join :7/*ESUMEDID*/ um (nolock) on um.Cd_unidade_medi = mat.Cd_unidade_medi where pr.Process_item = ':2' group by pr.OP, dem.Item, mat.Descricao, tal.talao, um.Mascara ) a order by a.OP

insert into gesqlret (Id_registro, Usuario, Campo3, Campo88, Campo4, Campo63, Campo133, Campo89, Campo23, Campo5) select row_number() over (order by a.OP) + (select max(Id_registro) from gesqlret(nolock) WHERE Campo23='ETAPAS'), ':1', 'MONITORPROCESSO', * from (select pr.OP, dem.Item, mat.Descricao, sum(dem.qt_necessaria) Qt_necessaria, tal.talao, um.Mascara, isnull((select top 1 r.Descricao from TE_TALAOXRESP tr (nolock) inner join TE_RESPOSTA r (nolock) on r.Pergunta = tr.Pergunta and r.Sequencia = tr.Resposta inner join TE_PERGUNTA p (nolock) on p.Id = tr.Pergunta and p.Exibe_Monitor = 1 where tr.OP = pr.OP), '') Comprimento from :3/*PCPROCOP*/ pr (nolock) inner join :4/*PCTAOP*/ tal (nolock) on tal.OP = pr.OP and tal.Class_hierarq_ini = pr.Class_hierarq and tal.situacao = 'A' and tal.Num_neg = ':8' inner join :4/*PCTAOP*/ tala (nolock) on tala.OP = tal.OP and tala.situacao = 'C' and tala.Num_neg = ':8' and tala.Cd_area_setor = (select Area_process from :3/*PCPROCOP*/ esc (nolock) where esc.OP = pr.OP and esc.Process_item = 'ESCAREACAO') inner join :5/*PCDEMOP*/ dem (nolock) on dem.OP = pr.OP and dem.Class_hierarq = pr.Class_hierarq and dem.atendido = 0 inner join :6/*ESMATERI*/ mat (nolock) on mat.Cd_material = dem.Item inner join :7/*ESUMEDID*/ um (nolock) on um.Cd_unidade_medi = mat.Cd_unidade_medi where pr.Process_item = ':2' group by pr.OP, dem.Item, mat.Descricao, tal.talao, um.Mascara ) a order by a.OP

Text.val: IMPRIME ETIQUETA - Deve imprimir antes de gerar os mvtos pois busca os insumos abertos do talao

SQL_STMT_U.val: select dem.OP, dem.Seq_item_ped, mat.Referencia, res.Descricao from :2/*PCDEMOP*/ dem (nolock) inner join :3/*PCPROCOP*/ pr (nolock) on pr.OP = dem.OP and pr.Process_item = 'RASPA' inner join :4/*PCTAOP*/ tal (nolock) on tal.OP = pr.OP and tal.Class_hierarq_ini = pr.Class_hierarq inner join :5/*ESMATERI*/ mat (nolock) on mat.Cd_material = dem.Item inner join TE_TALAOXRESP tre (nolock) on tre.OP = dem.OP and tre.Talao = tal.Talao inner join TE_PERGUNTA per (nolock) on per.Id = tre.Pergunta and per.Descricao like '%COMPRIMENTO%' inner join TE_RESPOSTA res (nolock) on res.Pergunta = tre.Pergunta and res.Sequencia = tre.Resposta where dem.op = :1 and dem.atendido = 0
SELECT mdi.Db_sessionid FROM ESMOVDIG mdi (NOLOCK) WHERE mdi.Cd_material = ':1'

Text.val: Criao do programa. Exibe processos com demanda elegveis para efetivao.
Retirado a subtask e subform que exibia as respostas das perguntas com a opcao exibe monitor (obsoleta)
Passado apenas uma resposta de uma unica pergunta encontrada com a opcao marcada
Adicionado tratamento para visualizar somente RE da UN da Config 21
